runs.comm: length just outside off, cut to point without timing the stroke
bumper down leg side, England started like that - poorly - in the first T20
length on middle and leg, tucked down to long leg
outside off, moves away a little off a length, follows it and misses
blocks this time closer to off stump, backward point goes to his left to field but the steal a single
off the pad and into the leg side for a quick run again
length just outside off, bit of an outside edge to third man
back of a length around off stump, helped around the corner towards square leg
dabbed from just outside off into the point region, no single available
quick bumper, good carry, Gambhir hooks and misses
length ball, middle and off, Gambhir clears the front leg and looks to swing it away over the on side, gets it high on the bat through square leg

length outside off, a wild swing gets a huge outside edge that flies straight to third man who doesn't have to move. Rahane took a little step down the wicket and swung hard getting a huge edge and flew right down the fielder's throat, a good early blow for England, Rahane played well in Pune
movement again, away from the bat just outside off, Kohli pushed at it and missed
middle and leg, tucked towards square leg
slightly back of a length outside off, punched through cover point, not quite timed
blocked into the off side from a length just outside off, the scamper a single
just outside off, dabbed behind square on the off side from the crease
off stump, blocked back up the wicket
blocked into the off side for another quick single
full on the stumps and flicked through midwicket, well timed
back of a length and crucially wide enough to cut, thrashed dismissively to the point fence
length on the stumps, tucked to midwicket
big bumper, too high, ignored
on the back foot, blocked into the covers with soft hands and they take a quick single, good running
slower ball on a very full length, waited for and then driven, only gets it to mid on
length on the stumps, a step away and carve down to third man
full of length just outside off, driven into the covers
blocked with soft hands into the leg side from a length ball around middle and leg
whoops! Miles, miles down leg side this, that was Morkel-esque!
and now pulled over square leg, good timing again from Kohli
fuller length now, goes to drive and gets it off the inner half of the bat through midwicket
step to leg and a swing and a miss to a ball just outside off stump
that'll be four more, another short ball that is pulled away with aplomb
oh lovely, sweet-as-you-like cover drive, timed to perfection on the up through cover
straighter line and kept out into the leg side from the crease
blocked coming forward off the inner half of the bat, gets it through square leg but a no-ball, big un n'all
clear the front leg and clubbed wide of mid on, got enough bat on it
now tucked wide of deep square, more superb timing from Kohli
gets it through again, past the covers this time, a msfield by a sliding Morgan coming to his left from mid off, that should have been saved
forward and a nudge down to long on
length ball, too straight and tucked down to long leg
doesn't adjust and Gambhir gets it off the pad rolling slowly towards long leg who has to come in a good way so they can take a couple
full ball outside off, Gambhir opens up the front leg and looks to swing it away, only gets it off the bottom of the bat into midwicket
short and leg side
slower ball boucner, decives Gambhir, goes over leg stump, fumbled by the keeper

straight and full, Kohli looks to play into the leg side, misses, big appeal for lbw and given out the finger goes up pretty quickly and Kohli might have been gunned down there because that's looks leg side in the replay. He got quite away across his stumps and the ball nipped back in and beat the bat but by doing might have been going down but may have nicked leg stump
full and leg side
blocked around middle and off up on the off side
full just outside off and slapped through point
blocked around middle and off on the front foot
little straight and worked through square leg
waited for and driven behind square on the off side, chase around for deep cover point
flicked to the 45 on the leg side on the front foot
tries to advance and doesn't time a straight drive, Tredwell saves himself well with the left hand

that is why Wright's bowling. Sends down a back of a length ball just outside off which Yuvraj pulls down long on's throat What a bonus for England. Could have hit that anywhere but has slapped it straight down the ground and the fielder didn't have to move to take the catch
back of a length just outside off, gets an inside edge towards backward point playing from the crease
forward and dropped into the covers to a ball around off stump
length outside off, punched hard to deep cover, very attractive stroke
flicked around the corner to long leg
opens the face and plays down to third man, wide enough for a couple
down the wicket, opens the face to go wide of long off, didn't quite place it as he'd wanted, better intent though
went to play to leg and got a bit of a leading edge, doesn't carry back to the bowler
big shot down the ground, didn't get all of it but enough to evade a flying Bresnan and it just carries the rope
plays into midwicket on the front foot
steps back and cuts to backward point, a sharp single
little straight and clipped out to deep square leg
length ball, on the pads, flicked to long leg for a single
fuller and outside the right-handed Rohit's off stump, worked straight to midwicket

slower ball, on the stumps, tries to punch off the back foot and gets an inside edge on to pad, it rolls short on the off side and Wright throws underarm at the stumps in his follow through, safe single there though
takes the pace off again, wide of the off, attempts a hoick across the line but digs it to midwicket

and gone, pressure told and top-edged to third man! Gambhir has laboured for more than half the innings to accrue 17, finally his frustration began to show and that was an ugly pull as the ball slid across him, it went very high but was well taken running around the boundary
length ball outside off, pushed back down the ground
full and tailing in towards off stump, closes the face and flicks through square leg to the man on the fence
angled across, touch full and wide of the stumps, left alone watchfully
tighter line, good pace from Meaker and Raina is tempted to fish at this one, opens the face and narrowly avoids steering straight to the keeper
short ball, banged in at Raina's bouncer-averse bonce, but he sees it early and swivel-pulls through square leg
back of a length, dropped short on the leg side, Raina is running with his gloves in one hand and turns down a second
slow bumper, well directed and Raina lobs this into the air off a top edge, the ball drops safely midway between wicketkeeper and long leg
tossed up on leg stump, dabbed short on the on side
short of a length, goes back and tapped into the covers, they scamper one and Raina goes sliding on his tummy to make his ground
tossed up and pushed down the ground for one to long-on
looped up around off stump, advances and gives this a bit of humpty inside out over extra-cover, the sweeper in the deep does well to prevent a boundary
slides down the leg side, flicked around the pad by Raina and they get one despite Meaker's excellent dive on the edge of the circle
tossed up outside off, pushed towards long-off for another one
good length, angling in towards leg stump, this is a sumptuous drive over extra-cover from Rohit, stepping away and carving it for four on the up
full and punched back, Wright manages to snag it in his follow through
pitched up outside off, leans into another wristy drive through the covers, this skedaddles along the ground but Bresnan hares round from long-off to prevent another boundary
full and around the line of off, worked through mid-on for a single
pitched up wide of the stumps, Raina opens the face and steers a couple into a gap behind point
again full and around off stump, Raina chops down on it, deflects off his boot and Wright sprawls to field in his follow through and prevent any further damage to his figures

tossed up, this doesn't spin and Rohit is castled! The delivery drifted in with the arm, bit of action on the ball but it just skidded straight on as Rohit went to slog-sweep across the line, trying to raise the tempo again but his middle stump was lost to the cause
pushed through outside the line of off, fiddled through the covers off the back foot
slow, flighted, on middle and leg, this straightens a Raina gets a leading edge that drops a few yards short of the bowler
flatter, angled towards leg stump from round the wicket, glanced through square leg
tossed up around off stump, worked with the spin to the man at midwicket
edged but there's no slip in and it runs away for four! Dhoni backed away and threw the plumbing at a cut shot, got a fair chunk of the ball and it flew past Buttler, much to Tredwell's chagrin

another edge goes begging, this time Raina pushing at a full one in the channel, a thick, low edge went to Buttler's left and, though he did well to get a hand on it, the ball flew away off his fingertips
pitched up and clipped forcefully off the pads, that whoomphed low through square leg for four, smoke trailing off it
tight line, blocked back down the wicket
shorter length, veering down the leg side, Dhoni gets a bit of glove on it and it lobs wide of Buttler again, Meaker does well to stop the ball from going for four at the second attempt
goes back and chops a length ball straight to point
bit more width this time, Dhoni clatters a cut shot past the same fielder, there's a man out on the rope but they pick up two
pitched up and absolutely creamed over mid-off, gets his front foot out and lofts a drive that bounces about a foot in front of the rope, super stroke
dug in, takes the pace off at the same time, guides one down to third man
on the pads, worked through midwicket
four more for Raina, though he didn't know much about this one, Meaker banged in the bumper, the batsman went hard at it and top-edged the ball a few feet over the keeper's head

bosh, that's right in the slot and smacked back over the rope! Meaker went for a leg-stump yorker, Raina sat in the crease and turned it into a half-volley that he battered flat over deep midwicket for six!
short and at the body, paddled flat around the corner, that'll skip away quickly too for four to long leg - excellent over for India, putting a bit of fizz back into their innings
that's a crushing blow, another short ball given the treatment, Dhoni waited on it and hooked over deep square leg like Thor swinging his hammer!
pitched up on the stumps, nudged into a gap on the leg side and they scamper two
slower ball, out of the Dernbach variety box, touch short and Dhoni waits for it before pulling carefully between deep square and long leg
good length ball outside off this time, driven with a lot of bottom hand off the back foot, straight to cover

takes the pace off again, out the back of the hand, that's not going to fox India's captain, who taps it short into the midwicket region and they pick up a second as the fielder has to come in from the boundary
overpitched, right in slogging territory outside off stump, Dhoni leans back and leathers a flat drive over long-off for six more... That's Dhoni's 100th T20 six!
dug in short, miscued hook shot but it balloons to safety on the leg side, they pick up one
on the stumps, Dhoni walks across and muscles the ball behind square on the leg side for another boundary - this is ruthless hitting
low full toss, at the stumps, Dhoni goes down on one knee and fashion another couple out towards deep midwicket, a stretching slide preventing four

picks out midwicket and Dhoni goes! England needed that... Bresnan dug the ball in but it wasn't quite short enough to pull, Dhoni wasn't able to time his shot and the ball popped in slow motion straight into Samit Patel's hands standing on the edge of the circle
back of a length, on leg stump, dropped short for a quick single
pitched up, this is a well-directed yorker, Raina can't get under it and plays the ball back to Bresnan in his follow through
slower ball to begin with, Ashwin swings and misses but the ball dribbles away off his pad for a single to bring Raina on strike...
angled across outside off, Raina swipes cross-batted but gets a bottom edge into the ground
scooped straight to deep cover and that's the end of Aswin! It was full and wide, there to hit, but Ashwin sliced it out towards the fielder coming in off the rope
oh, that's gone wrong for Dernbach, he beams one at Raina, who hooks it into the air and is caught at deep midwicket - but it's a no-ball for the full toss and a free hit
slower ball, on target and Raina mistimes his attempted yahoo towards midwicket, deflecting the ball short for one
genuine quick bouncer, Chawla flails across the line and misses, they scamper one to get Raina back at the scoring end, Buttler missing the stumps by an inch or two
full-length ball, carved through the off side but that picks out a fielder, they want a second but the pick up and throw is good, Chawla run out as a formality to conclude the innings
